verbs.description: effervesce (third-person singular simple present effervesces, present participle effervescing, simple past and past participle effervesced)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, of a liquid) To emit small bubbles of dissolved gas; to froth or fizz.
(intransitive, of a gas) To escape from solution in a liquid in the form of bubbles.
(intransitive, of a person) To show high spirits.
